cv-document.objective: Senior Java Developer / Technical Lead position in Financial Services area.

summary.summary-item: Over 10 years of experience in software development
Strong analytical skills and experience in Object Oriented concepts and programming techniques
Experience in Derivatives Trading Systems development
Extensive development experience in Java, J2EE, JSP, Servlet, EJB, JDBC, Struts, Spring Framework, Hibernate, XML, HTML, JavaScript for n-tier architecture
Relational Database (RDBMS) concepts, database designing, normalization, PL/SQL, stored procedures, triggers and extensively worked with Oracle and MySQL
Installation, configuration and administration knowledge of Apache Tomcat, Weblogic and Oracle Containers for J2EE (OC4J)
Experience in Web services technologies like Apache Axis, SOAP, WSDL
More than 5 years of experience working on Linux platform and shell scripting

Hands-on experience leading all stages of system development efforts, including requirements definition, analysis, design, coding, implement reusable components, using third-party API, test-driven development, resolution of defects, integrate and test, build, deployment and support
Mentor other members/juniors in the team
